article.citation: Overington JP, Al-Lazikani B, Hopkins AL: How many drug targets are there? Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Dec;5(12):993-6.

polypeptide.name: Glutathione S-transferase Mu 1
polypeptide.specific-function: Conjugation of reduced glutathione to a wide number of exogenous and endogenous hydrophobic electrophiles.
